actDetail: Go to actstudent.org to register for your ACT test Remember to include the schools you are applying to as a recipient of your test scores.
actMessage: If you're planning on taking the ACT Test on %TESTDATE%, you must register by %REGDATE%.
satDetail: Go to the College Board site and register to take the SAT. Go to https://sat.collegeboard.org/register. Remember to include the schools you are applying to as a recipient of your test scores.
satMessage: If you're planning on taking the SAT Test on %TESTDATE%, you must register by %REGDATE%.
